Package pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gameprops

Class GameProp

java.lang.Object
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.strategy.Gravity
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gameprops.GameProp
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Fruit, GoldCoin
public abstract class GameProp extends Gravity
GameProp is created by death of Enemy or Boss. It can be picked up by Hero.
Author:
YuyanZhou
